AboutPage.name: ROSANNA
AboutPage.bio: Software developer passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences. With experience in full-stack web development and interface design, I specialize in turning ideas into functional and attractive products.

sirenasApp.title:
SIRENAS
PROJECT
APP
sirenasApp.description: The Sirenas Project App was developed to offer users a smooth and intuitive mobile experience, facilitating access to key content, functionalities, and communications of the project.

sirenasWeb.title: WEB APP SIRENAS.TV
sirenasWeb.description: Complete web platform for streaming and multimedia content management. Built with modern technologies to ensure an optimal and scalable user experience.

crmSirenas.title: SIRENAS PROJECT CRM
crmSirenas.description: CRM for customer and sales management at Sirenas, a company dedicated to selling marine products. This CRM allows users to manage contacts, sales opportunities, interaction tracking, and report generation to optimize the sales process.
